value.title: Google Is Reportedly Working on an Advanced Version of Its Bard Chatbot
value.excerpt: Google is seemingly working on developing a more advanced version of its Bard chatbot. Launched in May 2023, Google’s conversational AI bot was designed to be a competitor to ChatGPT but fell flat with many users compared to OpenAI ’s model.

value.title: Report: Google developing new version of Bard based on its flagship Gemini Ultra LLM
value.excerpt: Google LLC is believed to be building a new version of its Bard chatbot that runs on Gemini Ultra, the most advanced large language model the company has created to date.

value.title: Google DeepMind has new rules to make sure AI robots behave when tidying your home
value.excerpt: The tech giant has introduced a set of new advancements that seek to make robots powered by AI a lot safer to deploy at home.

value.title: Google Bard Advanced Tipped to Arrive as Paid Subscription, Might Be Linked to Google One
value.excerpt: Bard Advanced is scheduled to arrive in early 2024 and is expected to be powered by Google's advanced Gemini Ultra AI model.

value.title: Google 'Bard Advanced' Found In The Wild
value.excerpt: Google seems to be testing a "Bard Advanced" upgraded version made available through a paid subscription to cloud storage platform Google One. The discovery was made by a couple of developers and shared on X.

value.title: 2023 the Year of AI: ChatGPT, Bard, Google Gemini, Deepfakes and AI Laws
value.excerpt: AI, if these two letters didn’t dominate your 2023, what did? It was the year Google, Microsoft, Meta and Amazon went into an AI arms race, investing heavily in it. ChatGPT, Bard, Google Gemini have made AI a household name.

value.title: Google will restrict election-related queries that Bard and AI-search can answer
value.excerpt: Google restricts Bard and SGE for election queries to curb misinformation ahead of 2024 U.S. Presidential elections.

value.title: Alphabet to limit election queries Google Bard and AI-based search can answer
value.excerpt: Google said it will restrict the types of election-related queries its chatbot Bard and search generative experience can return responses for.

value.title: 2024 election: Google to restrict queries from Bard, AI-based search
value.excerpt: Google will restrict election-related queries from Bard and AI-based searches, Reuters reported. The announcement from the Alphabet company comes ahead of the pivotal 2024 US Presidential election.

value.title: DeepMind Says Its AI Solved a Math Problem That Humans Were Stumped By
value.excerpt: DeepMind claims that for the first time, an AI has solved a famously difficult math problem with a solution that eluded human mathematicians — which could be huge if it holds up to scrutiny.

value.title: Google DeepMind Used a Large Language Model to Solve an Unsolvable Math Problem
value.excerpt: Google DeepMind has used a large language model to crack a famous unsolved problem in pure mathematics. In a paper published in Nature today, the researchers say it is the first time a large language model has been used to discover a solution to a long-standing scientific puzzle—producing verifiable and valuable new information that did not previously exist.

value.title: Google’s TensorFlow: Revolutionizing Machine Learning and AI Development
value.excerpt: Introduction: In the ever-evolving landscape of artificial intelligence, Google’s TensorFlow stands as a beacon of innovation, revolutionizing the way we approach machine learning and AI development.

value.title: DeepMind’s AI finds new solution to decades-old math puzzle — outsmarting humans

value.title: ChatGPT vs. Google Bard, round 2: How does the new Gemini model fare?
value.excerpt: The new Gemini-powered Bard keeps the same spirit ("He envisioned a sport that would unite people...") with more concision and focus. Interestingly, GPT-3.5 is the only model we tested to imagine Lincoln as a youth instead of a restless president sitting in the White House.
